DOC.brief_summary: A pilot study to evaluate the extent of PGE2 inhibition (mean aqueous values) by Ketorolac 0.04% following peripheral iridotomy
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Ketorolac 0.4% in Prostaglandin Suppression
DOC.criteria: Patients scheduled to undergo phakic IOL implantation History of intraocular surgery in the operative eye
